content:
In total, the strikes were made to eleven regions of Ukraine.

About thisreported March 8Military Media Center of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

According to him, 145 settlements and 320 infrastructure sites were attacked.

The enemy used mortars, tanks, artillery, rocket launchers, anti-aircraft missile systems, operative-tactical missile systems, UAVs and tactical aviation.

There are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

BeforeIt was reportedthat two people were killed as a result of Kupyansk firing.
title: During the day the enemy fired 145 settlements
description: This was reported on March 8 by Military Media Center of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. For his ...
author: Army Inform
